Topic.Title: Order of objects in scope lists

Posts.EditableText: What is the order of the objects returned from the various scope functions? Can I rely on them being the same as the order they appear in the Quest editor (assuming no movement of objects)?
Posts.HTML: What is the order of the objects returned from the various scope functions? Can I rely on them being the same as the order they appear in the Quest editor (assuming no movement of objects)?

Posts.EditableText:
Generally it will be the order they're defined in the ASLX file. When objects move during a game though, they're moved to the end of the parent object's children (using a hidden meta-field), but not everything necessarily respects that sort order.

I would say this behaviour is undefined, so I wouldn't rely on this being the same in future versions and it may change without warning.
